body:
Mmmh, you are right, I think I missed some cases... for example, do we want to authorise creating gradients nodes under `gradients/sub` if we already created some under `gradients`? I feel that we don't but both algorithms will let it pass.

I'll write down a few more test cases and find something compliant with all of them.

body_text:
Mmmh, you are right, I think I missed some cases... for example, do we want to authorise creating gradients nodes under gradients/sub if we already created some under gradients? I feel that we don't but both algorithms will let it pass.
I'll write down a few more test cases and find something compliant with all of them.
